name: Cosmo Craft (JustAKnight)
description:
Oops! You have No Internet.

Explore the universe in search of Wi-Fi signals.

Collect as many Wi-Fi signals as possible!

Controls:-------------------------------

PRESS TO GO UP:

PLAYER 1                         PLAYER 2

⬅ Left Arrow Key         A - Key

➡ Right Arrow Key      D - Key

⬆ Up Arrow Key               W - Key

HOLD TO GO DOWN:

PLAYER 1                          PLAYER 2

⬅ Left Arrow Key          A - Key

➡ Right Arrow Key       D - Key

PRESS TO SHRINK:

PLAYER 1                            PLAYER 2

⬇ Down Arrow Key          S - Key
